thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 1:22 PM, 16 June 2025(Monday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Tarlac, Pampanga, Batangas and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Caloocan, Malabon, Valenzuela, Navotas, Quezon City, Manila), Rizal(Rodriguez), Bulacan(San Jose del Monte, Pandi, Santa Maria, Pulilan, Plaridel, Baliuag, San Ildefonso, Norzagaray, San Miguel), Zambales(Botolan, Cabangan, San Felipe, Masinloc, Palauig), Nueva Ecija(Santa Rosa, San Leonardo, Jaen, Gapan, General Mamerto Natividad, Llanera, Talavera, Cabanatuan, Palayan, Laur), Quezon(Calauag, Tagkawayan, Atimonan, Padre Burgos, Agdangan), Laguna(Cabuyao, Calamba) and Cavite(General Trias, Dasmarinas, Silang, Amadeo) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
